text: Ek single product kay liye simple aur effective design. Focus sirf ek product ki highlighting par hota hai.  Is mein ziada clutter nahi hota.

Multiple products kay liye zyada organized aur categorized design.  Alag alag categories aur sub-categories kay sath.  User experience ko behtar banane kay liye navigation clear aur easy honi chahiye.

Single product stores mein visual appeal aur product description par focus hota hai.  Multiple product stores mein navigation, categorization aur search functionality important hoti hai.  Donon mein hi clear call-to-action bohat zaruri hai.

step_heading: Aap kay liye kya best hai?
text: Aap kay business model aur product line kay hisab se single ya multiple product store design choose karen.  Agar aap limited products sell kar rahay hain to single product store behtar hai.  Zyada products kay liye multiple product store zyada suitable hai.
